work.name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
highlights: Work on AI-driven reconstruction of historical precipitation patterns to improve accuracy in climatology research.

work.name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
work.position: Student Assistant at KAIST International Relations Team (IRT)

work.name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
work.position: Undergraduate Research Assistant at the Center for Anthropocene Studies
highlights: Developed a research project titled 'Posh Protesters: Cultural Capital and Pro-environmental Political Action Participation', focusing on the intersection of socio-economic status and environmental activism.
Conducted regression analysis to explore the relationship between cultural capital and engagement in environmental activism.

work.name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
work.position: Student Assistant at KAIST International Scholar and Student Services (ISSS)
highlights: Assisted the immigration officer at the Global Visa Center.
Handled photography for major ISSS events, including KAIST ONE and the KAIST Year-End Party.

work.name: Schoters
highlights: Mentor 20+ students for international study programs, leading to successful scholarship and admission results.
Optimized application essays for clarity and impact, significantly boosting students' chances for higher education opportunities.

work.name: Daewoong Pharmaceutical
highlights: Executed comprehensive benchmarking of a telemedicine app, contributing to UI/UX enhancements.
Assisted in strategy development for the Indonesian market to enhance Nulook App's penetration and relevance.
Translated 8,000+ rows of app content from Korean to English, boosting the Wellcheck App's global usability and accessibility.

work.name: Ruangguru.com
highlights: Taught mathematics and English to junior high school students at Ruangbelajar Plus.

leadership.name: APRU
leadership.position: Student Cohort - APRU SDG Education for Global Citizenship
highlights: Collaborated with peers from APRU member universities to address mental health issues prevalent among college students.
Engaged in focused discussions, analyzing and strategizing solutions to alleviate mental health challenges faced by college students.
Played a significant role in developing innovative prototypes, aiming to enhance mental health support for college students within the APRU network.

leadership.name: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR)
highlights: Selected as one of 150 delegates from all over the world.
Collaborated in an 8-member team for a Deloitte-sponsored Impact Challenge, devising strategic solutions for Carousel, an emerging social media enterprise.

leadership.name: Daejeon Support Center for Foreign Residents
highlights: Taught multicultural children simple science experiments.

leadership.name: Common Purpose

leadership.name: Persatuan Pelajar Indonesia di Korea (PERPIKA)
highlights: Led a team to organize the KS-Clinic Mentorship Program, providing mentoring to potential Indonesians for the Global Korea Scholarship.
Changed the program mechanism from paid mentoring to free mentoring in collaboration with the Indonesian Embassy in South Korea.
Increased the diversity of participants, reaching 19 provinces in Indonesia.

leadership.name: Young Southeast Asian Leaders Initiative (YSEALI)
